publications.title: Induced pluripotent stem cell derived pericytes respond to mediators of proliferation and contractility

genomic_characterisation.summary: All iPSC lines used in this study were reported to have karyotypically normal karyograms within 10 passages of use for experiments; iPSC lines were used between passages 5–35.
